00027 #ifndef _FB_H
00028 #define _FB_H
00029 
00030 #define FB_NONE     0x00    
00031 #define FB_ACK      0xCC    
00032 #define FB_NACK     0x0C    
00033 #define FB_BUSY     0xC0    
00037 #define FB_MAX_GROUP_ADDR   19  
00038 
00039 
00040 /* bit values for the systemstate register */
00041 #define SS_PROG     (1 << 0) 
00042 #define SS_LLM      (1 << 1) 
00043 #define SS_TLE      (1 << 2) 
00044 #define SS_ALE      (1 << 3) 
00045 #define SS_SE       (1 << 4) 
00046 #define SS_UE       (1 << 5) 
00047 #define SS_DM       (1 << 6) 
00049 #ifndef FALSE
00050 #define FALSE (0!=0)         
00051 #endif
00052 
00053 #ifndef TRUE
00054 #define TRUE  (0==0)         
00055 #endif
00056 
00057 #endif /* _FB_H */
